Today I take a deep dive into the Bank of New York Mellon, FCPA enforcement action around the hiring of close family members violating the FCPA. I discuss the enforcement theories, the underlying facts, the penalties and the lessons to be learned by the compliance practitioner in this matter. Embed Video
